definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Maisie spends a lot of money on records.
sentences.chinese: 梅西买唱片花了很多钱。

sentences.english: Have you checked out the new music store?
sentences.chinese: 你去逛过新开的唱片店了吗？

sentences.english: His firm was named in homage to the Beatles' record label, Apple.
sentences.chinese: 他的公司命名苹果以向披头士乐队的唱片致敬。

sentences.english: Kelley, a critically acclaimed singer-songwriter, is due to release a new album in February.
sentences.chinese: 作为创作型歌手的凯利将在明年二月发行新唱片。

sentences.english: Decca Recording Co. , rejecting the Beatles, 1962
sentences.chinese: 德克唱片公司，拒绝披头士的评语，1962。

sentences.english: Chao signed with the image of cool tricks Linfair record.
sentences.chinese: 张超以帅气花样的形象签约福茂唱片。

sentences.english: DJ is putting on his usual disc.
sentences.chinese: 唱片师又放上一碟经典。

sentences.english: Over the last five years an independent record shop has closed in the UK every three days.
sentences.chinese: 英国在过去的五年里，每三天就会有一间唱片店关闭。

sentences.english: Julia keeps up to date with all the latest pop record releases.
sentences.chinese: 朱丽娅收集了最近发行的所有流行音乐的唱片。

sentences.english: So many copies were sold that the factory was producing 320,000 copies of the record every day.
sentences.chinese: 唱片的销路非常好，以致唱片厂的日产量达32万张。

sentences.english: So many copies were sold that the factory was producing 320,000 copies of the record every day.
sentences.chinese: 唱片的销路非常好，以致唱片厂的日产量达32万张。

sentences.english: He recorded the song from an old record album.
sentences.chinese: 他录制了来自老唱片集的歌。

sentences.english: Labels therefore had a unique force over artists.
sentences.chinese: 所以唱片公司对艺人有独特的强制力。

sentences.english: The sturdy crossfader module can be placed on the left or right side.
sentences.chinese: »唱片平滑转换器可放置在左侧或右侧。

sentences.english: BMG Records are fully behind Westlife.
sentences.chinese: BMG唱片也将完全支持西城男孩。

definition: album/record (music)/special collection of printed or broadcast material
